ygData.subject: Re: Hanging out in Cazic-Thule P2
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes you could, but it does not always work. If the pet has a DOT spell on them, they will continuously attack the target. If the target is attacking the pet,
ygData.messageBody:
Yes you could, but it does not always work. If
the pet has a DOT spell on them, they will
continuously attack the target. If the target is attacking the
pet, using /pet back off does almost nothing, since
the instant the monster hits your pet it'll start
attacking again.<br><br>Plus, Enchanters cannot send
commands to their pets at all. Their animations are set to
permanent "guard" mode.<br><br>That's why I went without a
pet in Cazic Thule
:)<br><br><br>Nelmubar<br>Enchanter on Brell
